item.text:
“To the angel of the church in Sardis write the following:

“This is the solemn pronouncement of the one who holds the seven spirits of God and the seven stars: ‘I know your deeds, that you have a reputation that you are alive, but in reality you are dead.

<st data-num="1127">Wake up</st> then, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4741" class="">strengthen</st> what <st data-num="3062" class="">remains</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> was <st data-num="3195" class="">about</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="599" class="">die</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> I have <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st> <st data-num="4137" class="">complete</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1799">in the sight<n id="3" /> of</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st>, <st data-num="3421" class="">remember</st> <st data-num="4459">what</st> you <st data-num="2983" class="">received</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5083" class="">obey</st> it,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3340" class="">repent</st>. <st data-num="1437" class="">If</st> you do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1127" class="">wake up</st>, I will <st data-num="2240" class="">come</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="2812" class="">thief</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you will <st data-num="3756 3361">never</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> at <st data-num="4169" class="">what</st> <st data-num="5610" class="">hour</st> I will <st data-num="2240" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">against</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> you <st data-num="2192">have</st> a <st data-num="3641" class="">few</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">individuals</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4554" class="">Sardis</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> have <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3435" class="">stained</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">clothes</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they will <st data-num="4043" class="">walk</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> dressed<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3022" class="">white</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> they <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="514" class="">worthy</st>.

The one who <st data-num="3528" class="">conquers</st><n id="1" /> will be <st data-num="4016" class="">dressed</st> <st data-num="3779">like them</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3022" class="">white</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">clothing</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I will <st data-num="3756 3361">never</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1813" class="">erase</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="976" class="">book</st> of <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st><n id="6" /> will <st data-num="3670" class="">declare</st><n id="7" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">before</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">before</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="32" class="">angels</st>.
The one who has an ear had better hear what the Spirit says to the churches.’

“To the angel of the church in Philadelphia write the following:

“This is the solemn pronouncement of the Holy One, the True One, who holds the key of David, who opens doors no one can shut, and shuts doors no one can open:

‘I <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st>. (<st data-num="2400">Look</st>! I have <st data-num="1325" class="">put</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1799" class="">in front of</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> an <st data-num="455" class="">open</st> <st data-num="2374" class="">door</st> <st data-num="3739">that</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">no one</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> <st data-num="2808" class="">shut</st>.)<n id="2" /> I know<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you <st data-num="2192">have</st> <st data-num="3398" class="">little</st> <st data-num="1411" class="">strength</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st><n id="5" /> you have <st data-num="5083" class="">obeyed</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> have <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="720" class="">denied</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>.

<st data-num="2400" class="">Listen</st>!<n id="1" /> I am going to <st data-num="1325">make</st> those people <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="4864" class="">synagogue</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="4567" class="">Satan</st>—who <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> they <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">yet</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> are <st data-num="5574" class="">lying</st>—<st data-num="2400" class="">look</st>, I will <st data-num="4160" class="">make</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2240" class="">come</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4352">bow down</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="1799" class="">at</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">acknowledge</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> have <st data-num="25" class="">loved</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="3754" class="">Because</st> you have <st data-num="5083" class="">kept</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">admonition</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="5281">endure steadfastly</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2504" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="2504" class="">also</st> <st data-num="5083" class="">keep</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="5610" class="">hour</st> of <st data-num="3986" class="">testing</st> that <st data-num="3195">is about</st> to <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="3650" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="3625" class="">world</st> to <st data-num="3985" class="">test</st> those who <st data-num="2730" class="">live</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>.

I am <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st> <st data-num="5035" class="">soon</st>. <st data-num="2902">Hold on</st> to <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> you <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> <st data-num="3367" class="">no one</st> can <st data-num="2983">take away</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4735" class="">crown</st>.<n id="2" />

The one who <st data-num="3528" class="">conquers</st><n id="1" /> I will <st data-num="4160" class="">make</st><n id="2" /> a <st data-num="4769" class="">pillar</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3485" class="">temple</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he will <st data-num="3756 3361">never</st> <st data-num="1831" class="">depart</st> <st data-num="1864">from it</st>. I<n id="3" /> will <st data-num="1125" class="">write</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> of <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> (the <st data-num="2537" class="">new</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st><st data-num="2597"> that comes down</st> <st data-num="1537">out of</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>),<n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="2537" class="">new</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> as well.
The one who has an ear had better hear what the Spirit says to the churches.’

“To the angel of the church in Laodicea write the following:

“This is the solemn pronouncement of the Amen, the faithful and true witness, the originator of God’s creation:

‘I <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3777" class="">neither</st> <st data-num="5593" class="">cold</st> <st data-num="3777" class="">nor</st> <st data-num="2200" class="">hot</st>.<n id="1" /> I <st data-num="3785" class="">wish</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> either <st data-num="5593" class="">cold</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2200" class="">hot</st>!

<st data-num="3779" class="">So</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="5513" class="">lukewarm</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3777" class="">neither</st> <st data-num="2200" class="">hot</st> <st data-num="3777" class="">nor</st> <st data-num="5593" class="">cold</st>, I am <st data-num="3195">going<n id="1" /> to</st> <st data-num="1692" class="">vomit</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1537">out of</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4750" class="">mouth</st>!

<st data-num="3754" class="">Because</st> you <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st>, “I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="4145" class="">rich</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> have <st data-num="4147">acquired great wealth</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5532" class="">need</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">nothing</st>,” <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st><n id="2" /> do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">realize</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="5005" class="">wretched</st>, <st data-num="1652" class="">pitiful</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4434" class="">poor</st>, <st data-num="5185" class="">blind</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1131" class="">naked</st>,

<st data-num="4823" class="">take</st> my <st data-num="4823" class="">advice</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="59" class="">buy</st> <st data-num="5553" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="4448" class="">refined</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">so</st> you can <st data-num="4147" class="">become rich</st>! Buy from me<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3022" class="">white</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">clothing</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">so</st> you can be <st data-num="4016" class="">clothed</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="152" class="">shameful</st> <st data-num="1132" class="">nakedness</st><n id="3" /> will <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="5319" class="">exposed</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> buy <st data-num="2854" class="">eye salve</st><n id="4" /> to <st data-num="1472" class="">put on</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3788" class="">eyes</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">so</st> you can <st data-num="991" class="">see</st>!

All <st data-num="3745" class="">those</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473">I</st> <st data-num="5368" class="">love</st>, I <st data-num="1651" class="">rebuke</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3811" class="">discipline</st>. <st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> be <st data-num="2206" class="">earnest</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3340" class="">repent</st>!

<st data-num="2400" class="">Listen</st>!<n id="1" /> I am <st data-num="2476" class="">standing</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="2374" class="">door</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2925" class="">knocking</st>! <st data-num="1437" class="">If</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="191" class="">hears</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="455" class="">opens</st> the <st data-num="2374" class="">door</st> I will <st data-num="1525" class="">come</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">into</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his home</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1172">share a meal</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

I will <st data-num="1325" class="">grant</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">one</st><n id="1" /> who <st data-num="3528" class="">conquers</st><n id="2" /> permission<n id="3" /> to <st data-num="2523" class="">sit</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="2362" class="">throne</st>, <st data-num="5613">just as</st> I, <st data-num="2504" class="">too</st>, <st data-num="3528" class="">conquered</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2523">sat down</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2362" class="">throne</st>.
The one who has an ear had better hear what the Spirit says to the churches.’”
